Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> my advice to you is to mine more speculative coins. You might not break even mining ZEC+ZEN, but if you mine HUSH+ARRR+LABS and other KMD asset chains, which are not listed on normal mining calculators, you have the *potential* to win big. You do not have the *potential* to win big by mining ZEC+ZEN, you will grind out a basic living
